column1: Table 2: For all new off-payroll engagements between 23 August 2012 and 31 March 2013, for more than £220 per day and more than 6 months1
Number of new engagements which include contractual clauses giving the department the right to request assurance in relation to income tax and National Insurance obligations
Number for whom assurance has been requested and received
Number for whom assurance has been requested and not received
Number that have been terminated as a result of assurance not being received
1 Table includes Cabinet Office ALBs with the exception of the Government Procurement Service. Figures exclude personnel on secondment from non-central government organisations.
